name: Student Project Walking simulator
description:
This game is a walking simulator with perspective puzzle mechanics through the game. The goal is to escape the rooms one after another.

Control scheme :

ZQSD to move

Space to jump

E to pickup obj

Game Design : Younes Nachi, Eleanor Fuselier, Patricia Adenot, Sylve Renault

Level Design : Younes Nachi

Programmation : Sylve Renault

3D Art : Sylve Renault

2D Art : Patricia Adenot

We recommend using a GTX 1060 or higher to play.
